list_definition.definition: a kind of tool for turning screws

list_ex_of_english: Should it also include those which require a screwdriver to remove?
For example, the court have held a screwdriver to be a house-breaking implement.
Screwdrivers and spanners are necessary in munitions factories.
We need long-term investment in research and development—otherwise we will finish up as a screwdriver nation.
An obvious example might be a swordstick or a sharpened screwdriver.
If one had a hammer, a chisel or a screwdriver, one would fall within the ambit of subsection (6)(b).
I suppose that the average handyman probably has about eight screwdrivers which he has bought at various times.
This is readily apparent in the case of artifacts such as can openers, screwdrivers and chairs.
